original: @284a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @284a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aarya t'a re de b'i sto tra n'a ma /
analyzed: aarya t'a re de b'i sto tra n'a ma /
translated: Āryatārādevīstotra-nāma

original: bod skad du /🔽'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bod skad du / 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Praise to the Noble Goddess Tārā

original: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Tārā, the venerable one!

original: bzlog dka' srid pa'i mun pa ni //
analyzed: bzlog dka' srid pa'i mun pa ni //
translated: The darkness of existence, so hard to overcome,

original: 'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs //🔽thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
analyzed: 'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs // thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba //
translated: is like the light of the sun that destroys it.🔽I constantly bow to Tārā,

original: sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud //
analyzed: sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud //
translated: whose mind is moistened with compassion.

original: shin tu rno ba'i sems rnams kyis //
analyzed: shin tu rno ba'i sems rnams kyis //
translated: With a very sharp mind,

original: glang po che rnams gsol byed pa //
analyzed: glang po che rnams gsol byed pa //
translated: she eats elephants.

original: lha mo seng ge khros pa yang //
analyzed: lha mo seng ge khros pa yang //
translated: The lioness, O Goddess,

original: khyod bstod pa las 'jigs shing 'bros //
analyzed: khyod bstod pa las 'jigs shing 'bros //
translated: frightened by your praise, flees.

original: mche ba'i mdung rtse rnon po yis //
analyzed: mche ba'i mdung rtse rnon po yis //
translated: With the sharp spear of her tusks,

original: brag 'joms shing gi rtsa ba 'don //
analyzed: brag 'joms shing gi rtsa ba 'don //
translated: she destroys rocks and uproots trees.

original: khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas pa las //
analyzed: khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas pa las //
translated: From the recitation of your mantra,

original: 'jigs shing glang chen 'bros par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jigs shing glang chen 'bros par 'gyur //
translated: frightened, the elephant flees.

original: phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa //🔽du bas khyab cing bzod par dka' //
analyzed: phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa // du bas khyab cing bzod par dka' //
translated: The entire directions and sky🔽are pervaded by smoke, hard to bear.

original: 'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa //
analyzed: 'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa //
translated: With flames, she is angry,

original: khyod bstod char bas me zhir 'gyur //🔽ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i //
analyzed: khyod bstod char bas me zhir 'gyur // ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i //
translated: The rain of your praise will extinguish the fire.

original: phut sgra sgrogs shing dug mang can //🔽sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas //
analyzed: phut sgra sgrogs shing dug mang can // sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas //
translated: The many-poisoned snake,🔽Hissing from the hood of its head,🔽Will be frightened by your praise, goddess,

original: nam mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'jigs //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'jigs //
translated: As if by a garuḍa.

original: ral gris gcod cing 'dral ba rnams //
analyzed: ral gris gcod cing 'dral ba rnams //
translated: Those who cut and tear with swords,

original: khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste //
analyzed: khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste //
translated: Their limbs smeared with blood,🔽Will be powerless,

original: khyod kyi ming tsam dran pa @284b yis ;🔽/ chom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyi ming tsam dran pa @284b yis ; / chom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur //
translated: Merely by remembering your name.

original: rgyal po khros pas bran rnams kyi //
analyzed: rgyal po khros pas bran rnams kyi //
translated: The king, enraged, seizes his servants

original: skra nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings //🔽btson ra spangs te lha mo kye //
analyzed: skra nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings // btson ra spangs te lha mo kye //
translated: By the hair and binds them with ropes.🔽But, goddess, those who praise you

original: khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur //
translated: Will be freed from prison and fearless.🔽The ten directions and the sky

original: dpa' rlabs tshogs kyis phyogs bcu dang // nam mkha' yang dag khyab byed pa //🔽gru log na yang rgya mtsho las //
analyzed: dpa' rlabs tshogs kyis phyogs bcu dang // nam mkha' yang dag khyab byed pa // gru log na yang rgya mtsho las //
translated: Are completely filled with masses of waves.🔽Even if a ship is wrecked,

original: khyod kyi 'phangs ni pha rol phyin //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'phangs ni pha rol phyin //
translated: You will reach the other shore of the ocean.

original: khrag dang klang pa'i 'dam gyis byugs //
analyzed: khrag dang klang pa'i 'dam gyis byugs //
translated: Smeared with blood and mud,

original: de dag bza' ba la chags pa //
analyzed: de dag bza' ba la chags pa //
translated: Those who are attached to eating

original: khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely praising you,

original: sha za de ltar 'jigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: sha za de ltar 'jigs par 'gyur //
translated: the flesh-eating spirits become so terrified

original: yan lag chad cing dri nga ba //
analyzed: yan lag chad cing dri nga ba //
translated: that their limbs are cut off, they stink,🔽and blood and pus flow from their noses.

original: khrag dang rang ni sna nas 'dzag / khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: khrag dang rang ni sna nas 'dzag / khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely praising you,

original: mdzes can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: mdzes can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur //
translated: the beautiful ones become like the god of love.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry and thirsty become like the king of the universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,

original: bkres skom gyis gdungs gces bu dang // slong ba yi dvags dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: bkres skom gyis gdungs gces bu dang // slong ba yi dvags dang 'dra ba //
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.

original: khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely praising you,

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur //
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,

original: 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa //
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa //
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.

original: de ltar sems nas khyod bstod pas //
analyzed: de ltar sems nas khyod bstod pas //
translated: By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.

original: dge ba gang bsags de yis ni //
analyzed: dge ba gang bsags de yis ni //
translated: By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,

original: 'jigs rten bde ba can thob shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'jigs rten bde ba can thob shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,

original: // / seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang // lcags sgrog chu dang sha za'i 'jigs pa ni //
analyzed: // / seng ge glang chen me sbrul chom rkun dang // lcags sgrog chu dang sha za'i 'jigs pa ni //
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,

original: 'joms mdzad zla 'od phung po ltar 'dzin ma //
analyzed: 'joms mdzad zla 'od phung po ltar 'dzin ma //
translated: the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely praising you,🔽the hungry ghosts become like the son of a universal monarch.🔽By merely

original: sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage and bow to the Blessed One, Tara.
